data.title: 1980's horror/Sci-Fi animated movie involving people and kids getting stabbed and beheaded

data.text:
Looking for the title of an 1980's horror/Sci-Fi animated movie. I was 5-7 years old, so it had to be 1982-84-ish.

Ultra violent, people and kids getting stabbed and beheaded, blood and guts might have been on a different planet.

I think it may have the word(s) 'planet' or 'horror' in it.

I saw it in the movie theater with my dad. Had nightmares for weeks, mom was pissed.

I saw it in the United States in downtown Virginia Beach, Virginia. Iâ€™m going to say it was in English because I was too young to read subtitles quickly enough for a movie.

Any help I would definitely appreciated, I can die a happy man when I get the name of that dang title.
